basics.name: Tariq Anwaar
basics.summary: With a keen interest in perception, controls, and state estimation, I bring a blend of academic rigor and hands-on experience in advancing robotic and autonomous systems. Currently pursuing my Masterâ€™s at CMU, I specialize in real-time state estimation and the development of perception stacks for autonomy.

work.name: Oshkosh Corporation
work.summary: During my internship at Oshkosh Corporation, I implmeneted a high-accuracy semantic segmentation model and enhanced object detection in autonomous vehicles. This model significantly improved navigation reliability while reducing dependency on high-definition maps, contributing to a more adaptable and independent AV stack.

work.name: Gamma Technologies
work.summary: During my internship at GT, I explored and implemented GT-Suite packages for various applications, with a prime focus on Electric Vehicle Modeling, Thermal Management of batteries and autonomy development models.

education.area: Robotics - Perception, Planning, and State Estimation

keywords: PID, LQR, MPC, DIRCOL, A*, D*, RRT, PRM, Symbolic planning and multi-agent planning

skills.name: General Robotics
